author: hwright
msg: Followup to r27244, fix compliation error.

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: A follow-up to r27180 and r27186, fixing the API breakage it
caused to the bindings (r27186 fixed only the compilation breakage).
(resolved): Adjust for move of "enum" constants from
(Choice): Remove inner class, moving enum-style fields to...
New class to house "enum" fields, plus result choice and merged-path.
(resolve): Adjust for change in data type returned by Java
(javaResultToC): Re-implement to marshal result choice and merged
path from Java object to C data structure.  Leverage javaChoiceToC().
(javaChoiceToC): Rename from javaResultToC().  Adjust for move of
implementation used by this test for API changes.

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Fix potential null pointer dereference in exception handling.
Add corresponding API for string conversions with apr_pool_t's.
(pstrdup): Add new instance method which handles a NULL m_str.

author: sussman
msg: Make libsvn_wc invoke the conflict-callback on property conflicts.
(The CLI callback doesn't actually handle them yet!)
(maybe_generate_propconflict):  take 3 new args, invoke conflict callback.
apply_single_prop_change):  take 3 new args, pass to
(svn_wc__merge_props):  pass 3 new args to the apply* functions.

author: ivan
msg: Add an entry for VisualSVN Server.
